answer: The Fall of the Berlin Wall
clues: When walls crumble, so do empires.
A pivotal Cold War moment in Europe.
It happened in 1989, between East and West.
A symbol of both division and hope for a reunited future.
summary: On November 9, 1989, the Berlin Wall fell, marking the symbolic end of the Cold War and the beginning of Germany's reunification.
